hadiths.text: Umair, the freed slave of Abi'l-Lahm reported:I was the slave (of Abi'l-Lahm). I asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) if I could give some charity out of my master's wealth. He said: Yes, and the reward is half and half between you two

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا أَنْفَقَ الْعَبْدُ مِنْ مَالِ مَوْلاَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What a slave spends of his master's wealth
